channel.title: Posts on Backlog Overload
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Backlog Overload

item.title: The Importance of Teaching
item.description: From a young age, we were taught by many people about many things. But rarely did we get taught on how to teach others, unless you major in pedagogy. I has always been a autodidact, so It fascinate me how others teach themseleves. During univeristy, I got a girlfriend, and somehow we always ended up study together even though she and I were in different departments. Naturally, I would have to study twice for both of our parts.
